title: Management JP World School calls on LG
description: Excelsior Sports Correspondent JAMMU, Nov 22: The management and Principal of JP World School, Jammu called on Lieutenant Governor, Manoj Sinha today and had an interaction focusing on the transformative role of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in education. During the discussion, school representatives highlighted how AI can enhance learning outcomes, modernize the 21st-century curriculum and prepare students for a rapidly evolving global landscape. Manoj Sinha appreciated the school’s progressive approach and stressed the importance of integrating emerging technologies into mainstream education […]

title: Golden Guitars to review stance on AI after 2026 awards
description: After a snap decision to ban generative tracks made using Artificial Intelligence for the 2026 Golden Guitar Awards, the Country Music Association of Australia is reviewing whether AI has a place in country music.
content:
It might not be able to strum a banjo, but could a computer ever win a coveted Golden Guitar?
That is the question facing the Country Music Association of Australia after AI-generated songs were submitted for the 2026 Golden Guitar Awards.
At the nom... [4073 chars]

title: Memory chip crunch set to drive up smartphone prices
description: Shoppers could face higher prices for phones, laptops and other gadgets next year, manufacturers and analysts warn, as AI data centers hoover up memory chips used in consumer electronics. The world's biggest tech companies are plowing head-spinningly huge sums into building the hardware that powers artificial intelligence tools like ChatGPT.…

title: AI in movies financially sustainable, but it doesn’t shape them: Shekhar Kapur
description: Panaji: Using artificial intelligence (AI) in the making of films is financially sustainable in terms of human labour and the scale of production, sai.

title: English: Pinoys edge in AI world
